heading: blair's wee bairn
subheading: british prime minister tony blair and his 45-year-old wife cherie are unexpectedly expecting a baby. romantic italians speculated that the first couple had conceived the child during a holiday in tuscany. but when blair was confronted by italian reporters in florence, he said the baby was likely the product of an overnight stay at balmoral, the royal retreat in scotland.
author: wired staff
text: british prime minister tony blair and his 45-year-old wife cherie are unexpectedly expecting a baby. romantic italians speculated that the first couple had conceived the child during a holiday in tuscany. but when blair was confronted by italian reporters in florence, he said the baby was likely the product of an overnight stay at balmoral, the royal retreat in scotland.
